Description:
Required skills to be successful:Computer Skills: Microsoft Office products. Ability and knowledge of the Parts portion of the Dealership Management System and other computer applications to support operations
Communication: Ability to communicate effectively with customers and company personnel
Relationship building: Needs to have the ability to build and maintain friendly, warm relationships with customers About the team:Working in a fast-paced and diverse environment, reporting diretly to the Parts Manager.  What equips you for the role:Minimum 3 years’ work experience in automotive or equipment spare parts especially Heavy Commercial Vehicles, Industrial Products and Construction Equipment
Bachelor’s degree or diploma in any discipline or equivalentJob Details
